addr: 10928 West Pico Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90064
title: A Bruin + Trojan Alumni Holiday Party and Toy Drive
desc: Celebrate the holiday season with food and drink specials all night, an ugly sweater contest, and great friends! Special Needs Network provides advocacy and support services for families with children who have autism and developmental disabilities in South Los Angeles, which is a region of LA County that has next to no services to speak of for these families.
